tweet: Experiencing a little spring blizzard in Northcentral #Montana today - right in the middle of planting. Can barely see the tractors through the snow. Thankfully it’s supposed to get back above freezing tomorrow. #FarmLife #mtpol pic.twitter.com/TiDthVdN4r
